DOC.brief_summary: Bone marrow cells were previously shown to enhance wound healing in experimental diabetes. In this pilot study, patients with chronic diabetic ulcers not healing under conventional therapy, will be treated with local application of autologous bone marrow cells.
DOC.brief_title: Local Application of Autologous Bone Marrow Cells for Treatment of Chronic Diabetic Ulcers
DOC.criteria: Diabetes mellitus chronic nonhealing foot ulcers (>4weeks) Charcot foot Nondiabetic ulcers Ulcers healing under conventional therapy Sepsis Hematologic disorders Pregnancy Acute inflammatory disorders Chemotherapy
